title: Pedro Costa - Letters from Fontainhas (Criterion Boxset)
description:
This torrent includes the full boxset, featuring:
"Ossos"; "No Quarto da Vanda"; "Juventude em Marcha", "Tarrafal", "Rabbit Hunters"; and the documentary "All Blossoms Again", among other extras. Check the full details below.

- "Ossos", newly restored in high-definition, and "In VandaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Room" and "Colossal Youth" remastered from the digital camera originals, all under the supervision of director Pedro Costa.

- "All Blossoms Again", a feature-length documentary on Costa, "Colossal Youth", and the - directorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s relationship to Fontainhas.

Enjoy.
